titleStmt.title: October the 6th. 1690. Ruptures or broken bellies cured in men, women or children; or bearing down in their privy parts: no cure, no money; but trusses of all sorts with springs or scrues, ...
titleStmt.author: Collings, Richard

notesStmt.note: At end: "By Richard Collings, from 9 to 12, at the bell, ..."
Title from caption and first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
